alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tarrant and northwestern Dallas Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bedford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Keller, Coppell, Hurst, Farmers Branch, Southlake, University Park, Colleyville, Addison, Highland Park, Richland Hills and North Richland Hills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 428 and 445. Interstate 30 between mile markers 47 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
